caption:
@phogabopdx, a Vietnamese restaurant in Portland, was shut down due to neighbors’ complaints about “strong odors.” It’s hard to ignore the parallels to the lunchbox stories that many Asian Americans grew up with — and this begs the question, *who* gets to decide what is or isn’t considered “smelly”? 🤔

This sets a worrying precedent that not only actively discourages cultural + culinary diversity, but also impacts the livelihoods of communities of color 💔
